channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游 22:47 ATTENTION !!!Threat of use of guided aerial bombs (GABs).Threat of use of guided aerial bombs (GABs).
item.description: 游 22:47 ATTENTION !!!Threat of use of guided aerial bombs (GABs).Threat of use of guided aerial bombs (GABs).#Zaporizhzhia_district This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 21:25 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
